Package Catalano.Imaging.Tools

The Catalano.Imaging.Tools namespace contains collection classes, which provide different image moments, analysis textures.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Blob
    Blob object.
    BlobDetection
    Detects blobs.
    ColorConverter
    Convert between different color spaces supported.
    ColorDifference
    Calculate color differences.
    CompassConvolutionKernel
    Compass Kernels for convolution filter.
    ConvolutionKernel
    Kernels for convolution filter.
    ExtractBlob
    Extract blobs with specified ID.
    GradientImage
    Computes gradients.
    Granulometry
    Calculate the granulometry function for a given image.
    GrayLevelCooccurrenceMatrix
    Gray Level Coocurrence Matrix (GLCM).
    GrayLevelDifferenceMethod
    Gray Level Difference Method (GLDM).
    GrayLevelRunLengthMatrix
    Gray Level Run Length Matrix (GLRLM).
    HaralickDescriptors
    Haralick's texture classification metrics.
    HistogramOfOrientedGradients
    Histograms of Oriented Gradients.
    HoughLine
    Represents line of Hough Line Transformation.
    HoughLineTransformation
    Hough line transfomation.
    HuMoments
    Compute Hu Moments.
    ImageMoments
    Image Moments.
    ImagePadding
    Image padding.
    ImageStatistics
    Gather statistics about image in Gray or RGB color space.
    IntegralImage
    Integral Image.
    Interpolation
    Interpolation routines.
    LawsTextureEnergy
    Laws Texture Energy Masks works by finding the average gray: Level, Edges, Spots, Ripples, and Waves in the image.
    LocalBinaryPattern
    Local binary patterns (LBP) is a type of feature used for classification in computer vision.
    NearestNeighborMatrix
    Nearest Neighbor Matrix.
    ObjectiveFidelity
    Objective Fidelity Criteria.
    QuadrilateralTransformation
    Performs quadrilateral transformation of an area in a given source image.
    RunLengthFeatures
    Run-Length Metrics.
    ShapeDescriptors
    Shape Descriptors.
    ZernikeMoments
    Compute Zernike moments.

Package Catalano.Imaging.Tools Description

The Catalano.Imaging.Tools namespace contains collection classes, which provide different image moments, analysis textures.
